Team4450.Lib

Class GamePad

  • java.lang.Object
    • Team4450.Lib.GamePad

  • public class GamePad
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides an interface to the GamePad buttons. It monitors the state of the GP buttons and raises events when button state changes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GamePad.GamePadButton
      Button object which contains button id and current and latched state and POV value of the button when contained in an event and if you directly request button state.
      static class  GamePad.GamePadButtonIDs
      Gamepad button id enumeration.
      class  GamePad.GamePadEvent
      GamePad event description class returned to event handlers.
      static interface  GamePad.GamePadEventListener
      Java Interface definition for GP event listener.

    • Field Summary

      double deadZone

      Constructor which adds all GamePad buttons to be monitored.

        joyStick - JoyStick object representing the GamePad.
        name - Identifying name for the pad object.
        caller - calling class instance (use 'this').

      • AddButton

        public GamePad.GamePadButton AddButton(GamePad.GamePadButtonIDs button)
        Add additional GamePadButton button to be monitored.
        Parameters:
        button - id value identifying button to add.
        Returns:
        New button added or existing button.

      • FindButton

        public GamePad.GamePadButton FindButton(GamePad.GamePadButtonIDs button)
        Find GamePadButton button by id in the list of registered buttons.
        Parameters:
        button - Enum value identifying button to find.
        Returns:
        Button or null if not found.

        Call to start GamePad button monitoring once all buttons are added.

      • GetPOVAngle

        public int GetPOVAngle()
        Get the actual instantaneous POV angle value directly from the GamePad.
        Returns:
        Angle in degrees.

      • GetLastPOVangle

        public int GetLastPOVangle()
        Get the last set POV angle. Only works if POV button is being monitored.
        Returns:
        Last POV angle in degrees or -1 if not set or button not defined.

      • GetCurrentState

        public boolean GetCurrentState(GamePad.GamePadButtonIDs button)
        Get the current state of the button.
        Parameters:
        button - Enum identifying button.
        Returns:
        True if pressed.

      • GetLatchedState

        public boolean GetLatchedState(GamePad.GamePadButtonIDs button)
        Get the latched state of the button. This is toggled by each button press.
        Parameters:
        button - Enum identifying button.
        Returns:
        True or false as set by last button press.

        Add (register) an event listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - function to register

      • removeGamePadEventListener

        public void removeGamePadEventListener(GamePad.GamePadEventListener listener)
        Remove an event listener registration.
        Parameters:
        listener - function to unregister
